name: Main Floor
description: Spacious main floor units featuring large windows, hardwood floors, and modern kitchen appliances.

name: Second Floor
description: Cozy second floor units with vaulted ceilings, plush carpeting, and large walk-in closets.

name: Third Floor
description: Spacious third floor units with high ceilings, large windows, and modern bathroom fixtures.

name: Basement
description: Comfortable basement units featuring exposed brick walls, ample storage space, and convenient laundry facilities.

name: Loft
description: Open-concept loft units with high ceilings, skylights, and industrial-chic finishes.

name: Penthouse
description: Spacious penthouse units with vaulted ceilings, large balconies, and panoramic views of the city.
